name: Shower Bag Tote, Mesh Caddy Toiletry Organizer 12”L x 9”W, Compact and Lightweight With Suction Cup, Cord for Hanging, Zipper and Drawstring Pouch 14”L x 10”W, Black
short_description: MUST HAVE IN A SHOWER, especially in a public places with no shelves to put your toiletries. Perfect for use in gym, dorm, swimming pool, hotel, while camping, travelling and more. Always bring this bag with you when you are away from home.

PERFECT SIZE. YUMA shower bag is big enough for your essentials, yet still very light and compact. Take what you need - shampoo, conditioner, shower gel, soap, puff, shaving cream, razor or other toiletries. You can put it in your gym bag, backpack or luggage.

MULTIPLE HANGING OPTIONS. You will always find a way to hang this bag. High strength suction cup is ideal for the shower walls with no available hooks. Long poly cord strap can be used to hook it around the shower handle or other object. Multifunctional snap hook can be used to hook onto shower curtain ring.

TWO FOR ONE PRICE - KEEP YOUR GOODS ORGANIZED AND DISCREET. Mesh caddy comes in a set with a multipurpose drawstring pouch for no additional cost. Black, dense, no see through material makes it perfect to keep your belongings private, e. g. intimate hygiene items. PLEASE NOTE: drawstring pouch is NOT waterproof.
MADE FROM HIGH QUALITY MATERIALS. Durable 210D and 230D Polyester makes this product very durable and it will last for a long time. PLEASE NOTE: IT DOES NOT COME WITH ACCESSORIES.
product_description: YUMA Shower Bag with Drawstring Bag ● No more putting and picking up your toiletries from a slimy public shower floor! You will always find the best way to hang your bag. Please see pictures for some great hanging ideas. ● YUMA bag is compact, lightweight and versatile solution for you. Majority of other shower caddies are too big or take too much space in your bag. This one doesn’t take any additional space - almost the same as your toiletries alone. ● Suction cup is a must if there are no hooks or shelves in a shower or bathroom. It works best on glass, glossy non-porous bathroom tiles, mirrors. Keep in mind - it will not work on porous, rough surfaces. In such case, please use another suggested hanging method. ● Simple and elegant YUMA design suits both men and women. ● See-through mesh makes it easy to find desired item. ● Quick-dry material allows water to easily drain, though, we always recommend to dry it properly! ● High quality zipper keeps things safely packed. ● Optimal length poly cord always helps to find the best way to hang the caddy. ● Drawstring pouch is made from very light, water repellent material, though it is NOT waterproof. If you are planning to put wet mesh shower caddy or other items in it, leakage through stitches may appear. In such case, we recommend to use additional plastic bag and put wet belongings in it. Afterwards everything can be safely packed in the pouch - it looks much better that way. Doesn’t it? :) SET INCLUDES: 1 x Mesh shower caddy 1 x Drawstring pouch 1 x High strength suction cup 1 x Poly cord 1 x Plastic snap hook ABOUT US We are a small company who works for you - active, restless, adventurous souls. We are here to make your life just a bit easier. Stay active! PLEASE NOTE: PRODUCT DOES NOT COME WITH ACCESSORIES.
product_details: Included Components ‎1 x Mesh shower caddy 1 x Drawstring pouch 1 x High strength suction cup 1 x Poly cord 1 x Plastic snap hook

The see-through mesh design makes items easy to locate and retrieve.
